name: Blue Square and the Mystery Cave
name_original: Blue Square and the Mystery Cave
description:
You are a square. Squares can't jump. That means you can only go down into that cave. However, jumping is not needed inside, as long as you know how to use your trusty new power.

Can you discover the secrets of the cave?

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48

CONTROLS:

A, D or Arrow keys to move

Hold Left Click to aim and shoot

Press R to restart from the nearest checkpoint

Enjoy :)
